frame.name: Severity_of_offense
frame.definition: <def-root>In this frame an <fen>Offense</fen> is described in terms of the legal or other punishing action that can be taken in response to the offense. <ex> He committed an <t>indictable</t> <fex name="Offense">crime</fex> . </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Offense
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Offense</fen> is the action, crime, or event which is described in terms of what legal or punishing action can be taken against the offender.</def-root>

FE.name: Code
FE.definition: <def-root>The legal <fen>Code</fen> under which the severity of the offense is determined. <ex>That crime is <t>indictable</t> <fex name="Cd">under British law</fex>.</ex></def-root>
